response.overview: From the lavish opening titles of this retro hippie ass fuck fest, this flawless gem will entertain like few videos do. Set in the sixties, this eight-scene winner follows a sex-crazed group of flower children engaging in all the hippie exploits from college protests to love-ins, but the emphasis is on anal sex. There's even a brilliant hippie art mini-movie thrown in.  The cast shines, especially Tim Lake as "Maxwell," but that's easy with Joe Diablo's hilarious and intelligent script, and Mondo Tundra's tight direction. Every attention is paid to historical detail right down to the ROTC psychos and goofy soundtrack, but is it hot? You bet your bippy! Stand outs include a hot three-girler, a foursome with an artsy oil projection background, and a cast orgy at the end, but all the scenes sizzle. So tune in, turn on, and drop out to get your copy of this guaranteed hit. Retailers should target the 30- to 50-year-old crowd.
response.title: Anal Anarchy
